mapper.sql: select p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_desc, p.img_addr, p.normal_price, p.promotion_price, p.priority, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time, p.enable_status, p.point, pc.product_category_id, pc.product_category_name, s.shop_id, s.shop_name from tb_product p INNER JOIN tb_product_category pc on p.product_category_id = pc.product_category_id inner join tb_shop s on s.shop_id = p.shop_id
mapper.insert: insert into tb_product(product_id, product_name, product_desc, img_addr, normal_price, promotion_price, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, point, product_category_id, shop_id) values(#{productId}, #{productName}, #{productDesc}, #{imgAddr}, #{normalPrice}, #{promotionPrice}, #{priority}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{enableStatus}, #{point}, #{productCategory.productCategoryId}, #{shop.shopId});
mapper.update:
update tb_product
product_name = #{productName}, product_desc = #{productDesc}, img_addr = #{imgAddr}, normal_price = #{normalPrice}, promotion_price = #{promotionPrice}, priority = #{priority}, last_edit_time = #{lastEditTime}, enable_status = #{enableStatus}, point = #{point},
product_category_id = #{productCategory.productCategoryId},
where product_id = #{productId} and shop_id = #{shop.shopId}
